!High Priest Sylvain: You have now become both the Hands and the Feet of the Temple of Einhasad. Before you can carry out even more important missions, however, you must achieve the title of the Limbs of the Temple. To do so, you must pass a simple oral exam. [Quest _137_TempleChampionPart1 sylvain_q0137_04.htm|Begin the oral exam.]
